1�Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.

1�What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.
1�You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.

�!�I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.

1�Complete transaction and return to capital?Yes.No.
1�What would you like to know?Nothing. I'm sorry.About performance assessment.About Allied Tags.About temporary items.About Unions.
1�Anyone wearing Allied Tags while participating in a campaign battle will be judged on their overall performance.
1�Soldiers will be evaluated not only on their fighting skills, but also on how much they contribute to the efforts of their allies through means such as healing and enhancing.
1�However, beware that if you leave the area before being assessed, you will be deemed a deserter and will forfeit all rewards earned that day.
1�Also, while there are no immediate penalties for being knocked out, falling in battle will significantly lower the score given to you.
1�When you are ready to receive compensation for your work on the field, return to me and I shall assess your performance and provide you with your payment.
1�That is all.
1�Allied Tags are a special type of identification given to all participants of Allied Campaign battles.
1�There are benefits, as well as drawbacks, to wearing the tags. One of the benefits is that in the case you are knocked out on the battlefield, you will not lose any experience points.
1�However, some of the drawbacks include the inability to improve skills and earn experience points for individual kills, as well as the right to loot fallen enemies.
1�That is all.
1�Temporary items can be purchased in exchange for Allied Notes.
1�There are several different varieties of items, but they all have one thing in common--they can only be used on the battlefield they were issued.
1�It is highly recommended that you first survey a battle's conditions and then select the supplies that you believe will benefit you most.
1�Please remember that all temporary items you carry on your person will be confiscated in the event that you leave the area.
1�That is all.
1�Oh ho! Keen to join a Union, are we?Very well. Listen up and I shall tell you all you need to know.

1�In order to better coordinate Allied efforts against the beastman menace, we have instituted a system of ad hoc tactical regiments called ??Unions.?? With five units to a battlefield, union registration is open to any proven soldier in possession of Allied Tags.
1�In return for their aid in advancing the war effort, union registrants will be eligible to earn a share of the spoils of war.

1�Needless to say, the choicest rewards will be reserved for those unions which make the greatest contributions in combat.Prove your mettle on the field of battle, and you will earn glory for your union, as well as a sizable bounty of your own.

1�Be forewarned that your commitment to your union comes first and foremost.In the aftermath of battle, you will not be permitted to reap rewards from your individual exploits until your union has distributed its plunder.
1�That is all.
1�Assist with the fortifications?Show them how it's done!Refuse to help.Ask for an explanation.
1�Choose a crystal!Fire crystal.Ice crystal.Wind crystal.Earth crystal.Lightning crystal.Water crystal.Light crystal.Dark crystal.Plumb give up.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Beneath the Mask.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Er, Nicolaus of Company Skink, sir.This is my comrade Five Moons.

1�Y-yes, of course, sir.We just thought we might better perform our duty if you could share with us some information.Any conspicuous changes in Zeid's behavior since he joined your esteemed unit, for exam--
1�Did he perhaps owe her a debt of many years past?A debt that he now seeks to repay...?

1�That said, we'll not gain access easily.Word has it that all relevant records have been confiscated as key evidence in the investigation.The Iron Musketeers are sure to have it locked away in their unyielding grip.
1�As much as it pains me to grovel at our rival's feet, we've no choice but to appeal to Captain Bartholomaus.Come,  , Five Moons...we return to the Metalworks!1�
1�Sulking and brooding...?
1�It would seem the matter of Captain Klara eats at our friend's soul as well.
1�What--!?You go too far, Nicolaus!
1�...I've not seen it myself, but they say there exists a tome of records detailing the comings and goings of all officers in our unit's storied history.
1�Yeah, yeah...took yer sweet time, didn't ya, maggots!?Well? Hand 'em over! And there better not be a single page out of place!
1�One, two--you expect me to read these chocobo scratches!?--three, four--bah, I've seen better quillmanship from a goobbue!--five...
1�Hm? I don't recall being on a first-name basis with no snot-nosed sissy boys.
1�His behavior? He's a bloody Galka, what do you think his ??behavior?? is!?
1�He stands around sulking and brooding like he's got the weight of the whole world on his shoulders!Bah! What does that fool know about responsibility!?
1�I've got myself a whole squad full of these louts to look after, and you don't see me complainin'!
1�Y-yes sir!
